title: West Oakland Loft Available (see video tour in description)
posting_body: Chic living at Calou Lofts!
Check out our walkthrough video at the following youtube link: https://youtu.be/SAzsGLrnBWc
Recently renovated, Unit C12 is a beautiful end-unit with awesome natural light from tall windows on two sides and bright skylights.
The unit features:
- Quartz kitchen countertops
- Dishwasher
- Modern bathroom floors, vanity, and toilet
- Stacked, in-unit washer/dryer .
there is also a shared washer/dryer in the complex
- Large bedroom closet (15ft wide x 20in depth x 92in height)
- Two storage closets
- Two independent workspaces
- Soft close kitchen cabinets
- Luxury vinyl flooring
- Vaulted ceilings
- Tall walls (great for projector TVs and art gallery walls)
This unit is also a perfect work-from-home unit.
During the 2020 lockdown, the owners had two separate workspaces that could accommodate 50 inch wide standing desks.

The lofts are a gated complex in West Oakland within a 10 minute drive Uptown, First Fridays, Downtown Oakland, Temescal, Lake Merritt, as well as easy access to BART, public transportation, freeways and the Bay Bridge!
The loft also comes with one free parking spot directly in front of the unit, with the option for a second parking spot for $80/mo.
Please email us if you are interesting in a showing.
The place can be made available as early as August 15, but we can be flexible on an earlier or later move-in
